available_offline.frame_button:
Ready to use offline!
Click here to dismiss.
available_offline.title: NookData is now available offline!
available_offline.content: NookData's assets and code have been saved to your device's cache; you can continue to use NookData, even offline!

available_update.frame_button:
Update ready!
Click here to update now.

If you receive another
'Update ready' message, you
should ensure all other NookData
tabs are closed.
available_update.title: Update ready
available_update.content: An update has been downloaded; when you're ready to update, close all open NookData tabs before opening a new one to use the new version.
